channel.title: Random number macro game ;)
channel.description:
Ok i made this in a study lesson so im bored as hell...
***Note - This is a macro for VISUAL BASIC, i forgot to mention this before***
[code]Sub autoOpen() Dim message As String Dim MyValue As String message = InputBox("Number game! Find the correct number within 1-10, if your above or below the number will reset and you can try again ;0!") Do Until message = MyValue message = InputBox("Number game! Find the correct number within 1-10, if your above or below the number will reset and you can try again ;0!") MyValue = Int((10 * Rnd) + 1) If message > MyValue Then MsgBox "Your number was above the number!" Else If message < MyValue Then MsgBox "Your number was below the number!" Else If message = MyValue Then MsgBox "Gratz! You guessed the number!" End If End If End If Loop End Sub[/code]
Save & run, it generates a random rumber & if you input the wrong number you fail & the number resets - if your below or above the number it tells you & when you get it you get a nice gratz!
This lame ass game was made by me ;).
*Do take into account that when bored as hell you do 'stuff' to keep yourself occupied ;)*
